          <title>
            <string language="en">Drawing a ray diagram for a converging lens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnen eines Strahldiagramms für eine 
zusammenlaufende Linse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tracer un diagramme de rayon pour un objectif 
convergent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenhando um diagrama do raio para uma lente 
converging</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tracciare uno schema del raggio per un obiettivo 
converging</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχεδιασμός ενός διαγράμματος ακτίνων για έναν 
συγκλίνοντα φακό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trazar un diagrama del rayo para una lente 
convergente</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These figures show the steps in drawing a ray diagram for a converging lens.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">converging lens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">drawing</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen die Jobsteps im Zeichnen
eines Strahldiagramms für eine zusammenlaufende Linse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces figures montrent les étapes en traçant un 
diagramme de rayon pour un objectif convergent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas figuras mostram as etapas em desenhar um 
diagrama do raio para uma lente converging.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste figure mostrano i punti nel tracciare uno 
schema del raggio per un obiettivo converging.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτοί οι αριθμοί εμφανίζουν τα βήματα στο σχεδιασμό 
ενός διαγράμματος ακτίνων για έναν συγκλίνοντα φακό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas figuras muestran los pasos de progresión 
en trazar un diagrama del rayo para una lente convergente.</string>
          </description>
